super_training_facility.name: Training Facility
super_training_facility.desc: Here you can build units to attack your opponents. The time in which each unit will be completed will depend on the level of the facility.
super_training_facility.feature: Reduce the recruitment time for units

super_operation_center.name: Operation Center
super_operation_center.desc: This building increases the efficiency of your empire and permits you to get a bonus on all of your income.
super_operation_center.feature: +0.5% Income per Level (Does not work on the daily prize)

super_research_center.name: Research Center
super_research_center.desc: The Research Center allows the training of your units in new techniques. As with the HQ, higher is the level, faster the skills are developed.
super_research_center.feature: Decrease the time required to learn new trainings

super_crackhouse.name: Crack House
super_crackhouse.desc: No tattletale will see the upcoming Empire through the cracks. You can produce DRUGS without fear and at your own pace.

super_hydrofarm.name: Hydroponic Farm
super_hydrofarm.desc: Transform an abandoned building into a farm and produce more DRUGS while saving on water and energy.

super_meth_lab.name: Meth Lab
super_meth_lab.desc: This building is all White and it’s your way to honor the Crystal Meth King by producing more and more DRUGS at a comfortable speed.

super_cocina.name: Cocina
super_cocina.desc: We call it 'LaCocina' or 'LaCuisine'. Add some salt, spices, sour, sugar to your DRUGS and it will be produced at a “Yes, Chef” speed.

super_pharma_lab.name: Pharmaceutical Lab
super_pharma_lab.desc: Produce DRUGS massively to take over the DrugWars.

super_ammunition.name: Ammunition Factory
super_ammunition.desc: This is the Ammunition shop that you’ve stolen and transformed into a factory to start a small production of WEAPONS.

super_weapon_factory.name: Weapon Factory
super_weapon_factory.desc: No more only Ammunitions, it’s time to get to a bigger league by producing more WEAPONS in your factory.

super_smuggle.name: Smuggle
super_smuggle.desc: Start your weapon business by smuggling them all over the place and to produces more WEAPONS.

super_blackmarket.name: Black Market
super_blackmarket.desc: This market is a way for you to expand your business and to trade your stuff for even more WEAPONS. Buyers and resellers can’t bargain with you.

super_metalprint.name: 3D Metal printing
super_metalprint.desc: You are not like any other Drug Lords, you are always after new technology and you know this is the revolution to build WEAPONS at a light speed in your backyard.

super_t_distillery.name: Traditional Distillery
super_t_distillery.desc: This building is the start of your homemade ALCOHOL production

super_bar.name: Bar
super_bar.desc: The best way to live in an addiction denial is to own a bar and to cut customer consumption with water to produce more ALCOHOL.

super_brewery.name: Brewery
super_brewery.desc: According to chemistry, ALCOHOL is a solution, then the Brewery is producing more solutions at a good pace.

super_castle.name: Castle
super_castle.desc: The Castle produces ALCOHOL by transforming grapes into wine.

super_industrial_distillery.name: Industrial Distillery
super_industrial_distillery.desc: The ultimate way to produce ALCOHOL that could fill your water fountain, your bathtub, your swimming pool and your pond in a blink of an eye.

super_small_kitchen.name: Small kitchen appliance
super_small_kitchen.desc: Use this small appliance to produce your own crack.

super_hash_extractor.name: Ice Hash Extractor
super_hash_extractor.desc: Produce the best natural hash extraction from home using only ice & water.

super_hid.name: High Intensity Discharge (HID) lights
super_hid.desc: Considered the “gold standard” for growing weed, these lights are powerful and proven to provide great yields.

super_salvia_lab.name: Special place for Salvia divinorum
super_salvia_lab.desc: No tattletale will see the upcoming Empire through the cracks. You can produce DRUGS without fear and at your own pace.

super_mushroom_spawn.name: Mushroom spawn
super_mushroom_spawn.desc: Mushroom spawn is sawdust permeated with mushroom mycelia — essentially the root structure of the fungus.

super_meth_room.name: Metamphetamine Room
super_meth_room.desc: A special room where the chemistry happen like in famous series.

super_salty_room.name: Salty Room
super_salty_room.desc: Produce pure salts of triboluminescent LSD emitting small flashes of white light when shaken in the dark of this room.

super_anabo_room.name: Anabolics Room
super_anabo_room.desc: All amino acids are formed from intermediates in the catabolic processes of glycolysis, the citric acid cycle, or the pentose phosphate pathway.

super_metal_drums.name: Industrial metal drums
super_metal_drums.desc: Put the leaves in the metal drums, over them with gasoline in order to extract the coca base.

super_opium_boxes.name: Opium Poppies Boxes
super_opium_boxes.desc: The milky fluid is harvested with a curved spatula and then dried in those open wooden boxes.

super_opium_ref.name: Opium refinery
super_opium_ref.desc: Refine the opium to make morphine, then further refine into different forms of heroin.

super_poppers_lab.name: Poppers lab
super_poppers_lab.desc: This laboratory permit to produce poppers.

super_pcp_lab.name: Crack House
super_pcp_lab.desc: This laboratory permit to produce pcp.

super_ghb_lab.name: Crack House
super_ghb_lab.desc: This laboratory permit to produce ghb.

super_mdma_lab.name: Crack House
super_mdma_lab.desc: This laboratory permit to produce mdma.
